synopsis.text: Water Dragon Lord's secrets, sinister pursuers, and a magical tomeâ€”join Lina Inverse, the fiery sorceress who takes from the rich and keeps it for herself, on her thrilling quest! Accompanied by her loyal but dimwitted swordsman, Gourry, her energetic apprentice, Amelia, and the brooding golem, Zelgadis, Lina seeks the legendary Claire Bible, hoping to undo the spell that transformed Zelgadis. As they face monstrous adversaries, muscle-bound bandits, and even Lina's greatest fear, the group encounters a mysterious priest named Xellos who promises to aid their search. But who are the dark forces hunting Lina, and what do they want? Dive into a world of magic, humor, and adventure as Lina and her friends unravel the mysteries of the Claire Bible and confront their formidable foes!
